title: Zoe Kravitz Bags Catwoman Role, Milind Soman Cheers For Superwife Ankita Konwar & More From Ent
text:
1. Zoe Kravitz Bags New Catwoman Role After Being Told She Was ‘Too Urban’ For ‘The Dark Knight Rises'

Best known for her role in Mad Max: Fury Road and Fantastic Beasts, Zoe Kravitz, who was once told she is too “urban” for The Dark Knight Rises has finally landed herself the role of the new Catwoman in upcoming Matt Reeves’ The Batman, which stars Robert Pattinson in the titular role.

2. Milind Soman Cheers For ‘Superwife’ Ankita Konwar As She Runs Her 1st World Major Marathon

“@ankita_earthy ran her first marathon major and with her best time yet, so proud of my #superwife,” wrote Milind Soman as he shared pictures on social media.

3. Janhvi Kapoor Wants To Play Female Joker, Says 'We Need Less Sanitised Roles For Women'

Don't Miss 864 SHARES

“I would love to play a female character that’s just as uninhibited as the Joker,” she was quoted as saying by Bollywood Humgama at the MAMI Movie Mela 2019.

4. Dalljiet Kaur Calls Shehnaz Gill's Love Angle With Paras 'Fake', Says She Has A Boyfriend Outside Bigg Boss 13 House

“All the planning and plotting was already done. There’s the winner of Splitsvilla, then another contestant faking love despite having a boyfriend outside the house. I don’t know how to say, ‘I love you, or look into my eyes…’ I can do all that as a character for my show but as Dalljiet, I didn’t want to, and Salman too told me that I played with dignity,” she added.

5. All Set To Make Marvel Debut, Kit Harington Says His Eternals’ Superhero Is Like Jon Snow

"I'm just thrilled, it's a whole new chapter and a whole new character to start thinking about, and one that, without saying too much, on the surface can look a little bit like Jon Snow... but actually, I think there's a lot to be done that's different," Harington said.
description: From Zoe Kravitz bagging Catwoman role in the Batman alongside Robert Pattinson to Milind Soman cheering for ssuperwife Ankita Konwar, here’s all that rocked the world of entertainment today. Milind Soman and Ankita Konwar are living inspiration for all of us. The adventure running couple often runs together giving us some major couple fitness goals.
